text: Kadam Singh ({{lang-hi|राव कदमसिंह गुर्जर was a leader of a group of Gurjars who fought against the British East India Company during the Indian Rebellion of 1857. During the rebellion, he was the raja of Parikshitgarh and Mawana in Meerut district.The Gurjars declared Chaudhary Kadam Singh their king to re- establish old Gurjar Raj. ==References== Category:People of the Indian Rebellion of 1857 Category:Indian rebels Category:People from Meerut district
title: Kadam Singh
